a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Annual number of new computer science PhDs in the United
PhDs who graduated in the given year from academic units of computer science, computer engineering, and information that
responded to the Computing Research Association's Taulbee Survey.
Data source: Computing Research Association via AI Index Report (2022)
Note: Since 2010, total response rates for the Taulbee Survey have ranged between 61–74%. This means that not every graduate is included, and the
share who are varies from year to year.
